summary.description:
An automatic open source library for 3D shoot architecture reconstruction and analysis for image-based plant phenotyping.

3D reconstruction from high-throughput plant phenotyping images.

Phenomenal is released under a Cecill-C licence.

A software framework for model-assisted analysis of high throughput plant phenotyping data.

title = {OpenAlea.Phenomenal: A Workflow for Plant Phenotyping}, month = sep, year = 2018, doi = {10.5281/zenodo.1436634}, url = {https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1436634}.
